::Striker::

Striker sighs. "There's never time to daydream in wars. And I've been in wars 
all my life."

He looks sadly out the window, looking at the ocean below. The pod tilts 
slightly as it turns, correcting its course. "Over the last several months, 
there were battles every couple of seconds, so leasure wasn't an option."
